Posts.Content: I am going to print those thoughts-- why are people not thoughtful, say so many hurtful things . I will just say it to myself when I need it. x x
Posts.Title: Uplifting things

Posts.Content: Lovely of him--makes you feel a person not a number. I go tomorrow to see Oncologist re treatment, after that my Histology results -- seems an odd way round, that has been my problem all the time--changes. Think its because I have metaplastic  triple negative, x x
Posts.Title: Uplifting things

Posts.Content: Your thoughts were with me today---knowing people in the similar position helps, in the end I went alone. It was much easier than I thought, took ages to tell me how it works and what to expect. . Then an appointment with my specialist who told me I had Metaplastic Triple Negative B C  with no Lymph node involvement that's good as it is an aggressive form. I start Chemo on 15/ 09/17 via picc line--12 weeks  Paclitaxel then 4 cycles of A C just pray it works then have surgery, with Metaplastic T N and having Lupus I can't have any other medication. I am determined to get over this although I'm mid 70s I still have plenty to do. Thoughts and hugs to all in the similar position---   if Metaplastic. please get in touch.                Plastic   XXXXX
Posts.Title: To have the op or try alternative

Posts.Content: In a similar position I have Metaplastic Triple Negative Breast Cancer Can't find anyone with similar, I have an appointment on Wednesday to discuss treatment--not a lot of choice.
Posts.Title: To have the op or try alternative

Posts.Content: Your post re what to expect from Chemo lifted me you only really hear the bad , I have written down your Ginger Honey and Lemon will see if it replaces my ' white wine'----- I start on Friday not sure what with though I have an odd Cancer. C J x
Posts.Title: * * * SEPTEMBER BREAST CANCER CHEMO CLUB * * *

Posts.Content: I've just had my Picc line in, so far no problems with It . I start Chemo on Fri, first questions I asked was could I have a glass of wine, they said it would be O K . So I'm sorted unless it tastes  'awful'. C J
Posts.Title: * * * SEPTEMBER BREAST CANCER CHEMO CLUB * * *

Posts.Content: Had my first chemo today-- so far tired, will go alone next time and sleep its a lovely room for about 7 also many lovely  staff. My mouth is feeling odd --I am not good with Antibiotics, I HAVE NO PAIN IN BACK, ARMS OR HIP, Even breathing easier-- will test walking tomorrow all are caused by Lupus and can't have  meds while on Chemo, One of the GOOD additions  to my Chemo is  STEROIDS only have for Lupus twice a year.. Hope it carries on. Balance the good with the bad. C J xx
Posts.Title: * * * SEPTEMBER BREAST CANCER CHEMO CLUB * * *
